service.serviceDescription: Suppliers have the ability to accept or decline transportation based on a set rate.
Suppliers have the ability to manage their contractual relationship with the US Postal Service including manifests (schedule), invoice and payment status.
Supplier has the ability to manage Transportation Procurement Services here
Supplier has the ability to manage . Automated Forms (Surface Transportation Automated Forms) here
Supplier has the ability to manage Transportation Visibility Performance here... (refine serviceDescription).
